00001 //  MeCab -- Yet Another Part-of-Speech and Morphological Analyzer

00007 #ifndef MECAB_FREELIST_H
00008 #define MECAB_FREELIST_H
00009 
00010 #include <vector>
00011 #include <algorithm>
00012 #include "utils.h"
00013 #include "common.h"
00014 
00015 namespace MeCab {
00016 
00017 template <class T> class FreeList {
00018  private:
00019   std::vector<T *> freeList;
00020   size_t           pi_;
00021   size_t           li_;
00022   size_t           size;
00023 
00024  public:
00025   void free() { li_ = pi_ = 0; }
00026 
00027   T* alloc() {
00028     if (pi_ == size) {
00029       li_++;
00030       pi_ = 0;
00031     }
00032     if (li_ == freeList.size()) freeList.push_back(new T[size]);
00033     return freeList[li_] + (pi_++);
00034   }
00035 
00036   explicit FreeList(size_t _size): pi_(0), li_(0), size(_size) {}
00037 
00038   virtual ~FreeList() {
00039     for (li_ = 0; li_ < freeList.size(); li_++)
00040       delete [] freeList[li_];
00041   }
00042 };
00043 
00044 template <class T> class ChunkFreeList {
00045  private:
00046   std::vector<std::pair<size_t, T *> > freelist_;
00047   size_t pi_;
00048   size_t li_;
00049   size_t default_size;
00050 
00051  public:
00052   void free() { li_ = pi_ = 0; }
00053 
00054   T* alloc(T *src) {
00055     T* n = alloc(1);
00056     *n = *src;
00057     return n;
00058   }
00059 
00060   T* alloc(size_t req = 1) {
00061     while (li_ < freelist_.size()) {
00062       if ((pi_ + req) < freelist_[li_].first) {
00063         T *r = freelist_[li_].second + pi_;
00064         pi_ += req;
00065         return r;
00066       }
00067       li_++;
00068       pi_ = 0;
00069     }
00070     size_t _size = _max(req, default_size);
00071     freelist_.push_back(std::make_pair(_size, new T[_size]));
00072     li_ = freelist_.size() - 1;
00073     pi_ += req;
00074     return freelist_[li_].second;
00075   }
00076 
00077   explicit ChunkFreeList(size_t _size):
00078       pi_(0), li_(0), default_size(_size) {}
00079 
00080   virtual ~ChunkFreeList() {
00081     for (li_ = 0; li_ < freelist_.size(); li_++)
00082       delete [] freelist_[li_].second;
00083   }
00084 };
00085 }
00086 #endif
